enumtype.description: Flag for real stock level status

attribute.description: size of the StockLevelHistoyEntry, negative values for unlimited
Specifies the unit the distances in the store will be presented
It is property representing a schedule of opening hours of this point of service.
It is a localized attribute that contains informational store content text.
It is a media container with additional images of the store.
Determines if the partial type of orderModification is currently in progress
Determines if the order cancelling is at all possible
Determines if the order cancelling is still possible after sending it to warehouse

Determines if a complete cancel request is allowed after shipping has been started. This means: Cancel the part of the order that has not been shipped yet. Evaluated only if cancelAfterWarehouseAllowed is true.
Determines if the partial order cancelling (discarding whole order entries) is possible.
Determines if the partial order entry cancelling (discarding parts of order entries) is possible. This parameter is evaluated only if partialCancelAllowed is set to true.
Determines how long an order should wait in queue before it's started to be fullfilled

itemtype.description: Extending Address type with additional attributes.

attribute.description: Address line1 is a dynamic attribute that is stored in the Address.streetname field
Address line2 is a dynamic attribute that is stored in the Address.streetnumber field

itemtype.description: Generic variant product type. It doesn't not contain attributes describing the variant.
Value category for variant types (it defines the dimensions)
